content: these simple yet sturdy baskets are great yarnie storage options the tightly knit doubled fabric on the sides means they stand up on their own and can be picked up with items inside them they re knit in the round folded over and joined to form the sides then decreased for the bottom **size** small large 14 5 26 5 | 37cm 67 5cm outer circumference 12 24 | 30 5cm 61cm inner circumference 1 75 3 5 | 4 5cm 9cm tall **yarn** 1 2 skeins of cascade rebound **or** approximately 70 250 yards | 65 230 meters of comparable aran-weight yarn 164 yards per 100g | 150 meters per 100g **gauge** 21 sts and 27 row over 4 | 10cm in stockinette *this firm of a gauge gives the baskets structure be mindful of your hands especially if your yarn has any cotton like the sample the fabric is sturdy but a bit tough to knit * **materials** -size us5 | 3 75mm needles for knitting in the round or size needed to obtain gauge -yarn needle to weave in ends **skills** magic loop or otherwise knitting in the round knit purl decreasing 1 https //www instagram com/aleciahknits
